name: Whirl Tour
synopsis: Flipside is giving a stunning performance at Castle Coliseum. Suddenly, in the middle of the band's finale an audible power surge occurs, and lightning strikes each of the 6 band members. One after another they are vacuumed into the sky. The band's readie shakes his head in disbelief. "I have to find them!!!" He jumps through a color-shifting portal, grabs his scooter and rides off to search for his idols.
